Anokha Jasmine Serum

Brand: Anokha

Category: Serums & Essences

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: aqua/water/eau, glycerin, propanediol, caprylhydroxamic acid, glyceryl caprylate, panthenol, sodium hyaluronate, Jasminum grandiflorum (jasmine) flower extract*, Santalum album (sandalwood) oil, sodium bicarbonate, carbomer, benzyl alcohol**, benzyl benzoate**, linalool**, eugenol**, farnesol**
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
